properties.name: CLASSIFIERS_LIST
properties.description: Comma-separated list of classifiers to include in the summary output.

properties.name: CLASSIFIERS_FILE
properties.description: The package-relative OR absolute filename of the classifiers json file

properties.name: CLASSIFIERS_CONFIDENCE_MINIMUM
properties.description: The minimum confidence to include in classifiers output. When set to 0.3, classifiers with <0.3 confidence are excluded from produced tracks.

properties.name: ENABLE_DEBUG
properties.description: If true, each detection will include extra debug output.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEMPLATE
properties.description: If set, will override the default, tested prompt template with one read from a different file

properties.name: VLLM_URI
properties.description: The base_url of the openai-api-compatible API providing access to your model.

actions.name: QWEN SPEECH SUMMARIZATION (WITH FF REGION) ACTION

tasks.name: QWEN SPEECH SUMMARIZATION (WITH FF REGION) TASK
actions: QWEN SPEECH SUMMARIZATION (WITH FF REGION) ACTION

pipelines.name: WHISPER SPEECH DETECTION WITH QWEN SUMMARIZATION PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Runs Whisper speech detection on audio or video and summarizes the transcript using QWEN.
tasks: QWEN SPEECH SUMMARIZATION (WITH FF REGION) TASK
